infotexts.loadingscreentip: Sealed bombs can be recognized by quiet clicking sound you can hear while holding container. Stay all ears while checking the cargo!
infotexts.entitydescription.psc: Gate array used as component in creation of power-efficient tools.
infotexts.entitydescription.audioprocessor: Sound emitter with function of note sheet playback.
infotexts.entitydescription.2rdock: Recharge+Repair station used to recharge items with builtin batteries or repair broken tools..
infotexts.entitydescription.hydrogengenerator: A device used to refill hydrogen tanks.
infotexts.entitydescription.wetchip: Used alongside with detonator crate content. This circuit detonates explosives after some delay upon being contacted with water.
infotexts.entitydescription.timerchip: Used alongside with detonator crate content. This circuit detonates explosives after some delay.
infotexts.entitydescription.heatchip: Used alongside with detonator crate content. This circuit detonates explosives after some delay while being located out of water.
infotexts.entitydescription.lifechip: Used alongside with detonator crate content. This circuit detonates explosives after death of person carrying crate on their back.
infotexts.entitydescription.holdchip: Used alongside with detonator crate content. This circuit initiates 4 seconds detonation delay after crate was dropped out of character's inventory.
infotexts.entitydescription.smallbattery: Generally used for storing backup power in case of a reactor failure or powering emergency automatics.
infotexts.entitydescription.switchpanel: Has 5 customizable switches that can be connected to various sub sustems.
infotexts.entitydescription.protectivefuse: An element that protects power grid from overload damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.securityrelay: Disruption component designated for secure control on electronic systems.
infotexts.entitydescription.securityrelay_omni: Disruption component designated for secure control on electronic systems.\n[OMNI]
infotexts.entitydescription.bypassbutton: A button that sends signals if control chip with required access tag is swiped.
infotexts.entitydescription.acc_generic: Provides access to security relay control.
infotexts.entitydescription.acc_omni: Provides access to most of standard-tagged security relay control.\n[OMNI] [WEAP] [HELM] [ENG] [MED]
infotexts.entitydescription.weldingtable: A table with attached welding device used for creation of modified items.
infotexts.entitydescription.printer: A device for printing documents or assembly schemes.
infotexts.entitydescription.surveillancemonitor3: A device for monitoring cameras inside or outside the sub that has 3 linkable buttons.
infotexts.entitydescription.surveillancemonitor5: A device for monitoring cameras inside or outside the sub that has 5 linkable buttons.
infotexts.entitydescription.surveillancemonitor7: A device for monitoring cameras inside or outside the sub that has 7 linkable buttons.
infotexts.entitydescription.portableo2generator: Device used for refilling oxygen tanks by use of water electrolysis.
infotexts.entitydescription.detonatorcrate: Container for carrying and detonation of explosives.
infotexts.entitydescription.radiotransreceiver: Device for broad range communications that has room for carrying 6 additional items.
infotexts.entitydescription.posttray: Device for transferring items by use of pipe post.
infotexts.entitydescription.posttray_secure: Device for transferring items by use of pipe post.
infotexts.entitydescription.overdriveengine: A high revrate engine used to quickly achieve hgh speeds for short time.
infotexts.entitydescription.hppengine: Hydrodynamic Pump-type Propulsion engine that drives the submarine by pumping water through the pipe.
infotexts.entitydescription.twostrokepump: Powerful pump mainly used for buoyancy control.
infotexts.entitydescription.portablethermogenerato: A device for powering closed-circuit power grids.
infotexts.entitydescription.largedepthchargeloader: A depth charge loader with 3 slots.
infotexts.entitydescription.thermitecanister: A highly-flammable substance used to burn through hulls. Has built-in lightup system.
infotexts.entitydescription.thermaldrill: Plasma beam drill that is mounted on ship. Has great structure damage and equally great consumption of power in process.
infotexts.entitydescription.pilotseat: Device that can be used for steering while being able to receive video feed from cameras installed on vessel.
infotexts.entitydescription.underwaterscooterii: A battery-powered underwater propulsion device with power saving circuits installed.
infotexts.entitydescription.underwaterscooteriii: A battery-powered underwater propulsion device with power efficiency circuit and enhanced torque rotors installed.
infotexts.entitydescription.divingsuitinv: An atmospheric diving suit with several items slots capable of withstanding the immense pressure under Europa's crust.
infotexts.entitydescription.heavysuit: Specially-modified reinforced version of diving apparatus. Can survive higher pressure and more brutal attacks.
infotexts.entitydescription.hydrogentank: Portable hydrogen tank used in nuclear fusion reactions.
infotexts.entitydescription.deuteriumtank: A portable deuterium tank that creates higher power output during fusion reactions and has higher durability.
infotexts.entitydescription.plasmacutter_high: Cuts through various materials using a jet of ionized oxygen or other gas.
infotexts.entitydescription.paper: A thin sheet of A4 format used by printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.adrenogen: A strong chem that neutralizes drowsiness.
infotexts.entitydescription.ethylzine: A mixture of ethanol and hyperzine. Causes strong disorientation.
infotexts.entitydescription.isonanitegel: A plasmoid substance containing nanites, which is used to repair internal damage. Avoid overdosing!
infotexts.entitydescription.calibratedisonanitegel: A plasmoid substance containing recalibrated nanites, which is used to repair internal damage and cure consequences of gel overdose.
infotexts.entitydescription.bppsc: Blueprint for assembly of Power Saving Circuit.
infotexts.entitydescription.bpprop: Blueprint used for upgrading jetstream tools or locomotion devices.
infotexts.entitydescription.bpo2: Blueprint used to assemble portable oxygen generator.
infotexts.entitydescription.bpinv: Blueprint used to create diving suit with inventory module.
infotexts.entitydescription.bpisotope: Blueprint containing set of parameters for synthesis of isotopes in fabricators.
infotexts.entitydescription.bpwetchip: Blueprint for assembly of wetbomb trigger component.
infotexts.entitydescription.bpdecoy: Blueprints for assembly of radioelectronic devices and components.
infotexts.entitydescription.bpalienpower: Blueprint for assembly of items powered by alien power sources.
infotexts.entitydescription.bpbfg: Blueprint used for assembly of fulgusphere blaster and fulgurium cells.
infotexts.entitydescription.bpnanite: Blueprint for creation of nanite colonies.
infotexts.entitydescription.bpnaniteplus: Schematics with calibration data for nanites dedicated for medical use.
infotexts.entitydescription.explosivenuke: Uranium propelled explosive with high blast radius.
infotexts.entitydescription.explosivefrag: An explosive that consists of metal fragments mainly used to eliminate creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.syringeammobox: Used to charge coilgun with syringes.
infotexts.entitydescription.kinemagneticgun: Makeshift weapon that fires syringes or metal darts.
infotexts.entitydescription.chloroform: Anestesic chem that applies drowsiness on target.
infotexts.entitydescription.handhelddischarger: Makeshift short distance weapon that uses batteries to work.
infotexts.entitydescription.floatychargeshell: A barrel of explosives dropped off by depth charge tube. Remains floating until impact with enemy.
infotexts.entitydescription.nuclearfloatycharge: A barrel of really big explosives dropped off by depth charge tube. Remains floating until impact with enemy.
infotexts.entitydescription.floatydecoyshell: A decoy that can be deployed via the depth charge launcher. Will float while producing a loud acoustic signal to attract attention away from the sub.
infotexts.entitydescription.nuclearfloatydecoy: A decoy that can be deployed via the depth charge launcher. Will float while producing a loud acoustic signal to attract attention away from the sub.
infotexts.entitydescription.bfg: Blaster-type Fulgusphere Generator. Not for use in tight locations.
infotexts.entitydescription.nailgun: Makeshift ranged weapons that fires nails.
infotexts.entitydescription.holyhandgrenade: Pie jesu domine dona eis requiem.
infotexts.entitydescription.o2cartridge: Used by ionizer to supply thermal drill with plasma flow.
infotexts.outpost.rand: Welcome. Oxygen Levels: Nominal. Power Levels: Nominal. Radiation Levels: Suboptimal. Weather Forecast For Today: Cold and Damp.
Welcome to our outpost. Here you can visit our supplies shop or seek for new adventurers to sail with you.
A friendly reminder to our visitors: please do not drop garbage on floor - keeping outposts clean is a key for your health.

In case of hull breach don't panic - it won't help. The only thing that may help is boarding nearest submarine or shuttle or climbing up to colony in order to seek for proper shelter. Stay alive! Stay vigilant!
Feel exhausted at work? Visit our massage salon every saturday on level -49.
infotexts.entitydescription.detonatorcratesealed: A locked container with unknown contents that will be revealed after security check.
infotexts.entitydescription.detonatorcrateloot: A locked container designed for some sort of... suicide attack?
infotexts.entitydescription.metalcratesealed: A locked container with unknown contents that will be revealed after security check..
infotexts.entitydescription.artifactsealed: A locked container with unknown contents that will be revealed after security check..
infotexts.submarine.description.ironsailor: Based on the prototype assembled by RG Transportation in year 2250 and secret New Europa blueprints, "Iron Sailor" class submarines inherit the balance between performance and durability. Besides the updated equipment, the submarine has received a new heavy-type shuttle and reworked access shaft layout.
infotexts.submarine.description.berilia_mark_ii: Berilia is top of the line when it comes to mass and firepower. Its two engines and three ballasts require a copious amount of power to operate and keeping the machinery in condition is a handful for even a moderately large crew. Hovewer, upgraded version has a large pipe transport system that can be used to reduce maintenance difficulty and a turret pod for storming the far areas without extra risks.
infotexts.submarine.description.typhon_tr: Typhon class subs are known for their brutish appearance, reasonable array of light and heavy firepower, and their general dependability. Any captain should be aware of their poor rate of descent and unimpressive top speed. The upgraded version got equipped with Thermonuclear Reactor.
infotexts.submarine.description.btx_01_velocity: The first vessel of BTX series, which purpose is area petrol and rebel confrontation. It features powerful engine, average-level firepower and thermonuclear reactor.
infotexts.submarine.description.sprinter: Being designed by some engineer with heavy ethylic drunkness, Sprinter-class shuttles are designed for speed delivery of personnel or resources to the far locations. Hovewer, it has no weaponry or hull enforcements so it's unrecommended for use in extremely dangerous locations.
